body:
Comment 1: 
EBNF per se is never a standalone specification. The surrounding plain text must be
considered as well, e.g.

"The number of identifiers must be equal to the number of expressions, and the nth
identifier on the left is bound to the value of the nth expression on the right."[1]

  [1]: http://golang.org/ref/spec#Constant_declarations

IMO #WorkingAsIntended
